changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "stage" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "position" INT NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "started_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "finished_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "summary" TEXT NULL, "output_meta" JSONB NULL, "action_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("action_id") REFERENCES "action" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ); CREATE INDEX "idx_stage_action_position_active" ON "stage" ("action_id", "position") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL;
